name: Promote an ordinary user to a site administrator
Demote a site administrator to an ordinary user
Suspend a user
description: If your GitHub Enterprise appliance has [LDAP Sync with Active Directory LDAP servers](https://help.github.com/enterprise/admin/guides/user-management/using-ldap), this API is disabled and will return a `403` response. Users managed by an external account cannot be suspended via the API.

name: Unsuspend a user
description: If your GitHub Enterprise appliance has [LDAP Sync with Active Directory LDAP servers](https://help.github.com/enterprise/admin/guides/user-management/using-ldap), this API is disabled and will return a `403` response. Users managed by an external account cannot be unsuspended via the API.
